price: Se quiséssemos, fá-lo-íamos pulvéreo, então permaneceríeis exclamando:
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu lajaʿalnāhu ḥuṭāman faẓaltum tafakkahūna
